fitness.title: Fitness Certification for Metro Rail Projects
fitness.subtitle: Ensuring passenger safety and operational readiness before launch.

whatIs.title: What is Fitness Certification?
whatIs.body: Fitness Certification is conducted by the Commissioner of Metro Railway Safety (CMRS) and is mandatory before any section is opened to the public. It verifies safety, signalling, track and civil works, rolling stock, fire systems, communications, evacuation procedures, and emergency response readiness.

timeline.title: Certification Timeline
timeline.inline: Track laying complete → Trial Runs → CMRS Inspection → Certification → Public Operations

updates.title: Recent Updates / Notices
items: Yellow Line Extension received CMRS clearance on 15 Sept 2025.
Trial runs completed on Blue Line, certification expected soon.
Fire safety drill completed across Red Line depots.

authority.title: Certifying Authority
authority.body: The Commissioner of Metro Railway Safety (CMRS) is the statutory authority responsible for safety certification of metro rail projects in India. CMRS conducts inspections, audits, and trials before granting authorization for commencement of public operations.
